Avanade.accentureLogoAltText: Accenture logo, below and to the left of the Avanade logo
Avanade.microsoftLogoAltText: Microsoft logo, below and to the right of the Avanade logo
Avanade.description1: Avanade, founded as a joint partnership between Accenture and Microsoft, is the worlds leading digital innovator on the Microsoft stack.
Avanade.description2: As a consultant at Avanade, I am responsible for leading our clients to success in the digital age.  While Avanade specializes in Microsoft technologies, engagements can involve any technology.
Avanade.description3: During my tenure so far, I have developed strong Front-End development skills and proficency on the Salesforce platform.  I have worked with large, global teams and have worn many hats.

Morningstar.title: Intern
Morningstar.description: While studying abroad in London during the Fall Semester of my Junior Year, I had the opportunity to intern twice weekly in Mornginstar's London office.  It an incredible first hands-on experience in the industry.

University of Notre Dame.title: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
University of Notre Dame.description: During the spring semesters of my Junior and Senior years, I spend several hours a week as a TA for Data Structures with C++.

Spring Lake Beach Patrol.title: Lifeguard
Spring Lake Beach Patrol.description: As a high school swimmer living at the Jersey Shore, I was naturally inclined to spend my teenage summers as an oceanfront lifeguard.
Spring Lake Beach Patrol.description2: Through lifeguarding, I acquired many worldly skills and competencies at an early age such as critical decision making, clear communications, composure and confidence in front of a public audience, and collaborative leadership.
